original_text: But I have a few things to say against you. Some people among you agree with what Balaam taught long ago. He taught Balak to do a bad thing against God's people. Balak caused the Israelite people to do wrong things. As a result, they ate food that people had given to idols. They also had sex with people who were not their husbands or wives.
korean_text: 그러나 네게 두어 가지 책망할 것이 있나니 거기 네게 발람의 교훈을 지키는 자들이 있도다 발람이 발락을 가르쳐 이스라엘 자손 앞에 걸림돌을 놓아 우상의 제물을 먹게 하였고 또 행음하게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But I have a few things to say against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너에 대해 말할 몇 가지가 있다

sentences.original_text: Some people among you agree with what Balaam taught
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 어떤 사람들은 발람이 가르친 것에 동의한다

sentences.original_text: He taught Balak to do a bad thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 발락에게 나쁜 일을 하도록 가르쳤다

sentences.original_text: Balak caused the Israelite people to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 발락은 이스라엘 백성들이 잘못된 일을 하게 만들었다

sentences.original_text: they ate food that people had given to idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들이 우상에게 바친 음식을 먹었다

sentences.original_text: They also had sex with people
who were not their husbands or wives
